reviewText:
The book is so informative and well written.  The reader learns so much about life when the Vikings were traveling as well as life in Iceland.
  It was a fascinating history book.
The DVD is excelent if you want to learn about viking combat.  You need to buy the volume 1 too.

The narrator has a good speech, then it is easy for non-native English speakers in understanding.
Presents different training techniques.
Related archaeological finds.

I can tell they are working very hard to bring a great quality video to the fan base.  With volume two they add on to the moves from volume one.  Also the pausing and explaining some moves helps really understand the moves better.  I have started following them on Facebook so I can keep up to date on all the moves they are trying out. May the Gods allow my children to become students some day!
Item arrived quickly and is a great value.
Its ok - It would have been better with more outdoor footage and period clothing.

The folks from Hurstwic are right in that sweet spot where historical authenticity and modern communication methods meet.  They are enthusiastic and do a great job with their explanations and demonstrations.  Their knowledge of the sagas and historical context is surprisingly good.  Who knew we would ever have access to such a great resource?  Thank you, Hurstwic, for bringing this to life.
My son and I are practicing and learning Viking Combat and the 3 disc series is the best I've come across.

Honestly, anything done by Dr. Short and the Hurstwic group is well done.  They break it down simply, and in "chewable" pieces.  But you should finally contact Hurstwic after the DVD purchase, as Dr. Short is a great teacher, and a great help in your training.
Really good way to see how it works
I have been happy with the combative drills in these dvds, including sheild drills, I would like to see more expansion on axe and shield or double axe.
